      • createCalculationConfig

        public CalculationTasksConfig createCalculationConfig(List<? extends CalculationTarget> targets,
                                                      List<Column> columns,
                                                      PricingRules pricingRules,
                                                      MarketDataRules marketDataRules,
                                                      ReportingRules reportingRules)
        Description copied from interface: CalculationRunner
        Creates configuration for a set of calculations.
        Specified by:
        createCalculationConfig in interface CalculationRunner
        Parameters:
        targets - the targets for which values of the measures will be calculated
        columns - the configuration for the columns that will be calculated, including the measure and any column-specific overrides
        pricingRules - rules which define how the values are calculated
        marketDataRules - rules which define the market data used in the calculations
        reportingRules - rules which define how results should be reported
        Returns:
        configuration for calculating values for a set of measures for a set of targets

      • calculateAsync

        public void calculateAsync(CalculationTasks tasks,
                           BaseMarketData marketData,
                           CalculationListener listener)
        Description copied from interface: CalculationRunner
        Asynchronously performs a set of calculations for a single scenario, invoking a listener as each calculation completes.

        This method requires the listener to assemble the results, but it can be much more memory efficient when calculating aggregate results. If the individual results are discarded after they are incorporated into the aggregate they can be garbage collected.

        Specified by:
        calculateAsync in interface CalculationRunner
        Parameters:
        tasks - tasks that perform the calculations
        marketData - market data to be used in the calculations
        listener - listener that is invoked when individual results are calculated

      • calculateAsync

        public void calculateAsync(CalculationTasks tasks,
                           ScenarioMarketData marketData,
                           CalculationListener listener)
        Description copied from interface: CalculationRunner
        Asynchronously performs a set of calculations for multiple scenarios, each with a different set of market data. A listener is invoked when each calculation completes.

        This method requires the listener to assemble the results, but it can be much more memory efficient when calculating aggregate results. If the individual results are discarded after they are incorporated into the aggregate they can be garbage collected.

        Specified by:
        calculateAsync in interface CalculationRunner
        Parameters:
        tasks - tasks that perform the calculations
        marketData - the market data used in the calculations
        listener - listener that is invoked when individual results are calculated
